definition: obstructed/to fail/to oppress/to repress/to lower the tone/to bend back/to dampen
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: tries to work off his frustrations by spending on self-gratification.
sentences.chinese: 试图通过自我满足消费来摆脱他的挫折感。

sentences.english: And if you don’t aspire to anything, how can you be frustrated?
sentences.chinese: 倘若你无求无欲，怎么能会有挫折感呢？

sentences.english: In the meantime, the frustration among the AS3 community seems to be mounting.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，AS3社区的挫折感正逐渐蔓延。

sentences.english: The sense of frustration was caused by both subjective factors and objective factors.
sentences.chinese: 挫折感的产生既有主观因素，也有客观因素。

sentences.english: Postgame, Lin will release some frustration.
sentences.chinese: 赛后，林会发泄一些挫折感。

sentences.english: Part of Shamrock's frustration appears to be the Season 3 fighters.
sentences.chinese: 部分酢的挫折感似乎是本赛季第3战斗机。

definition: to thwart/to foil (sb's plans)/a setback/a failure/a defeat
setback/reverse/check/defeat/frustration/disappointment/to frustrate/to discourage/to set sb back/to blunt/to subdue
guilty conscience/to feel a twinge of guilt
